name: Nimber
description:
A simple game of nim against a computer, a series of towers will be placed around the center of the table, you take turns with the computer by removing any amount of blocks between 1 and a whole tower, the one to remove the last block wins.

Left click a block to remove that block and all blocks above

Hold down the right mouse button and move the mouse in order to orbit the camera around the table

Use the scroll-wheel to move closer/further from the table

Press "R" to start a new game

Press "H" to toggle between different hint levels

Press "ESC" to close the game

Skybox by: Marius Risan

Table by: Ulan Cabanilla (https://polyhaven.com/a/round_wooden_table_01)
